name: Enforcement
text: §271-38  Enforcement.  At the request of the public utilities commission, the department of transportation shall assign a motor vehicle safety officer employed by the department of transportation to assist in the enforcement of sections 271-8, 271-12, 271-13, 271-19, and 271-29, through the assessment of civil penalties as provided in section 271-27(h), (i), and (j). [L 1995, c 105, §§3, 7; am L 1996, c 102, §1; am L 1997, c 120, §6; am L 2004, c 199, §2]
